title: furrybaby Dog Cooling Mat, Pet Bed Self-Cooling Pad Cool Gel Bed Large Dog Pads Mats, No Need to Refrigerate or Freeze, Apply Indoors Outdoors Car(Blue 80x96cm)
features: 【Harmless Material】: High-quality 300D Oxford composite waterproof PVC, provides a safe and harmless environment for your pets. A thicker material will effectively resist scratching. Completely free from harmful chemicals, you won't have to worry about ingesting harmful substances when chews on the mat.
【Self Cooling】: The dog cooling pad do not need water, refrigeration or electricity, can effectively keep the low temperature.Helps dogs prevent overheating and dehydration.

【More Gel】:The gel content of the cooling mat for dogs is upgraded to 1.5%. The amount of gel will determine the cooling time, up to 3 hours! This cooling mat is even cooler and more effective at keeping your furry friend comfortable during hot summer days.

【Convenient Use and Store】: Our cooling dog mat can be used in various places. Perfect for hot days in the backyard or indoor, let them enjoy the cooling sensation. while its lightweight and foldable design makes it easy to transport and store. Use it as a kennel mat, car seat cover, or resting place for your pet.
【Easy to Clean】: The pet cooling mat is easily cleaned with a simple wipe or sprinkle some water, and wipe it with a soft brush or sponge.
